name: Bunny Hop (itch) (giangero)
description:
• Description :
  • Bunny Hop is a game made in 2 days  for my first ever Game Jam 2020 
  • Daisy the Rabbit likes to jump a lot ...
  • Follow the path and see where it leads you...
  • Trailer : 
  • Credits to :
  •  https://sketchfab.com/paulyanez 
  • https://sketchfab.com/nodoxi
  • https://sketchfab.com/dwelfster
  • for the enemy models , check them out.

And for Music Check Him Out here : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeyqXIVzy5RnRG-cW6khkeA

  • Disclaimer this might be a really hard platformer for most and for some  could be easy 
  • few tips are to bunnyhop and strafe like in csgo.
